name: Sumikko Gurashi: Oheya no Sumi de Tabikibun Sugoroku
summary:
A new "Sumikko Gurashi" Sugoroku party game (backgammon) for families and friends to enjoy together!

Sumikko and they friends are going on a dream trip around the world! Roll the dice, collect "Tapi-miles" on the way, and aim for your destination! The Sumikko who collects the most Tapi Miles will win!

The map of Sugoroku (backgammon) is full of various tricks! You can meet a variety of Minikko during the game, and the excellent concierge will offer you unexpected services... In addition, the game includes 30 mini-games that can be played with friends, family, or up to four people.
